alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Douglas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:18PM MDT until July 20 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS AND SOUTHWESTERN ARAPAHOE COUNTIES... At 416 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Centennial, or 9 miles south of Denver, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Centennial around 420 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lone Tree, Castle Pines and western Parker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
